name: zentabs
description: Keep the opened tabs amount below specified limit

maximumOpenedTabs.description: The maximum number of tabs before we start removing old ones

manualMode.description: If enabled, you will need to use a shortcut in order to trigger a tab cleanup.

neverCloseUnsaved.description: If enabled, we will avoid trying to close unsaved files

neverCloseNew.description: If enabled, we will avoid trying to close files that are not yet added to the project repo

neverCloseDirty.description: If enabled, we will avoid trying to close files that have not been committed to your repo
